DELETE /zones/{zone_id}/client_certifica.description: Set a API Shield mTLS Client Certificate to pending_revocation status for processing to revoked status.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

certificate_authority.description: Certificate Authority used to issue the Client Certificate

common_name.description: Common Name of the Client Certificate

csr.description: The Certificate Signing Request (CSR). Must be newline-encoded.

expires_on.description: Date that the Client Certificate expires

fingerprint_sha256.description: Unique identifier of the Client Certificate

issued_on.description: Date that the Client Certificate was issued by the Certificate Authority

organizational_unit.description: Organizational Unit, provided by the CSR

serial_number.description: The serial number on the created Client Certificate.

signature.description: The type of hash used for the Client Certificate..

status.description: Client Certificates may be active or revoked, and the pending_reactivation or pending_revocation represent in-progress asynchronous transitions

validity_days.description: The number of days the Client Certificate will be valid after the issued_on date

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

tags: API Shield Client Certificates for a Zone

schema.description: The UUID to match against for a certificate that was uploaded to the mTLS Certificate Management endpoint. If no mtls_certificate_id is given, the results will be the hostnames associated to your active Cloudflare Managed CA.

GET /zones/{zone_id}/client_certificates.description: List all of your Zone's API Shield mTLS Client Certificates by Status and/or using Pagination

schema.description: Client Certitifcate Status to filter results by.
Limit to the number of records returned.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters
